item.description:
We found a web site for ski tickets cheap - New Hampshire.  This would be for a ski trip with a couple days notice.  If there is interest we will select a date and make a positing soon.

 

Reply and RSVP if you would like to head north as a small group for a day trip skiing.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Who likes to ski? - Group Survey Only
